description: A humorous pun about hokey pokey.
title: Hokey Pokey
n_1: Alex and Sam are chatting at a party.
c1_1: Hey Sam, did you know I used to be addicted to the hokey pokey?
n_2: Alex grins, ready to reveal the punchline.
n_3: Sam laughs while Alex looks pleased with himself.
n_4: They both share a laugh, enjoying the moment.
c1_4: What's next? A new dance move?
